summary: New handmade Ground Textures for better Sykrim Experience
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/fozpk7.jpg[/IMG]

[color=red][b]Enhanced Normal Maps Update ONLINE NOW![/b][/color]

This Mod replaces the Skyrim Landscape Textures 

[color=orange]38 Textures and Normal Maps from beta 1.2 changed, all new, tiling 90% removed 
All Textures are in 1024x1024 format build from High Res templates - DXT1/DXT5 compression used - all mip mapped
With 1024MB Video Memory at least youre good to go [/color]

Installation :
Copy to Skyrim/Data ..
Overwrite if asked to ...

Uninstall :-( 
Delete Skyrim/Data/textures/landscape folder

Have Fun !!!

Other Mods by me:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12517]Outskirts of Skyrim[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8753]Breezehome Dog[/url]


[color=white]Good news!

My brother Daniel (awesome 3d modeller) teamed up and releases:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4581]High Res Wood and Stonework[/url]

Ethatron releases: 

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4834]High Quality LOD[/url][/color]

check Download for \"Better Landscape Skyrim redux\"

he offers three different Packages:

128x128 (for low memory Gfx Cards)

256X256 (Vanilla Size)

512x512 (for good computers)
author: dirkduggler
